titleStmt.title: Remarks upon Dr. Sherlock's book intituled The case of resistance of the supreme powers stated and resolved, according to the doctrine of the Holy Scriptures written in the year 1683, by Samuel Johnson.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the author, and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
